question: In the absence of any specific questions in the proposal form, an insured is not required to disclose a fact that ___________.

options.B: Increases the risk to the insurer
options.C: Influences the decision in acceptance of the risk
options.D: Affects insurer’s rating of the risk

question: Where there is a double insurance and the relevant policies contain a contribution condition the insured is obliged to claim against both insurers. The amount recoverable from each of the insurers is

options.A: An equal proportion of the loss irrespective of the sums insured
options.B: An equal proportion of the loss in accordance with the respective sums insured
options.C: The rateable proportion of the loss in accordance with the respective sum insured
options.D: The rateable proportion of the sum insured in accordance with the loss
